## Get full control of browsers via the APIs

<CardGroup cols={3}>
  <Card
    title="Connect API"
    icon="server"
    iconType="light"
    href="/api-reference/connect"
  >
    Connect to or create a Session on-the-fly.
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="Sessions API"
    icon="server"
    iconType="light"
    href="/api-reference/list-all-sessions"
  >
    Get full control of the Browser's Sessions.
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="Extensions API"
    icon="puzzle-piece"
    iconType="light"
    href="/api-reference/upload-an-extension"
  >
    Configure custom Chrome extensions for your Sessions.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>
